1.0.name: wordpress/microid
1.0.description:
"MicroID enables anyone to claim verifiable ownership over content hosted anywhere on the web" (microid.org). This plugin makes that easier by generating MicroIDs for you based on an identifier WordPress already has, or by an additional identifier you provide.

Partially inspired by other MicroID plugins by Richard Miller and Eran Sandler.
